## TraceComponent.initTrace() method

Initialize trace middleware

Execute in loadMiddleware event to ensure trace middleware loads before all other middleware for complete request chain tracing

**Signature:**

```typescript
initTrace(app: KoattyApplication): Promise<void>;
```
